values: I decided it was time for me to get a new journal. I'm EXTREMELY sick of  almond_eyez. If you want to be added to my new journal, comment & I'll add you as soon as I can. YOU MUST COMMENT ON MY NEW JOURNAL TO BE ADDED, if you comment here or don't comment at all, you will not be added. If you hardly ever comment on this journal, then don't bother being added to my new one. I would love to hear from my friends but some of you are slacking on the comment department. I might come back occasionally to update this lj but not liklely. ciao

1. Sociology-OBRIEN (First Sem.) 1. Psychology-BROWN (Second Sem.) 2. Dance 3-4-BORGESEN 3. AZ/AZ HISTORY-HILD 4. CHEMISTRY-NICKSIC 5. LANG. ARTS 5-6-BORCHERS 6. SPANISH 3-4 DEMIGUEL Lunches: 2, 2, 1, 1, 2 let me know if we have any classes or lunches together !! if you've ever had one of the teachers, tell me if you liked them or not ♥♥

Today -picked up Natalie -stopped by mcdonald's -went to wal-mart with mom and took like a million pictures 1 -saw "dodgeball" with the girlys tonight, pretty funny moovie and the guy from Motorcross was in it, HAWT. natalie and samantha got frappies and I saw a super cute guy who reminded me of WillE, yeah crazy. Walked to krispy kremes, got two free donuts because I think two guys that worked there had a little crush on me and natalie, haha. always nice to get free food HA! Got samantha's doughnuts 'on the house' pretty saaaweet. thanks for all the help tonight girlys<33 vroom vroom! rockin it natalie insisted on taking a picture of them... meet flango and flagno's identical twin HA! me pimpin it with a play dough tiki pole ddaaammmnn homie such piiiiimps ride that elephant natalie! watch yo back foo or ill bust a cap *hums theme to SWAT* natalie loves eeyore wayyy too much hey ladies sup? pimp size of pepi BATTLE OF SIR NATS-A-LOT AND FAIR LADY S-A-LITTLE FACE OFF! GOT HER! I NEVER LOOSE! mwahahaha SUCKER! pimpin' it with a bathroom rug and around and around it goes my friend natalie and i being natural p.i.m.p.s too cool for el jay Blossom!!! If you need a holiday somewhere in the sun let me show you something that is really fun take a sparkling holiday somewhere in bubblegum.... When the world around me goes insane you're here to remind me that a few good things remain... bubblegum makes me smile bubblegum makes me POP *a best friend is a sister destiny forgot to give you* BEST FRIENDS FOREVER<333 I LOVE YOU SO MUCH NATALIE ANN

Natalie and I started teaching Vacation Bible School at Joy this week and we both decided to take pictures of the adorable little kids we get to see every day!!! The poster the kids made Story time with Miss Natalie! Free time! Lindsay *left* Emaree *right* Natalie *middle* Amaya and Caitlin playing "house" Jason and Michael Ronian and Gavin but don't be fooled by their cuteness.... Coloring before snack time Alyana GROUP SHOT! Jason, Emaree and Alyana having fun playing dollhouse Natalie with Lindsay and Emaree awww I love Alayna Smile you purrrdy girlys!!! ooh and Jason Me and Emaree [I look possessed, HA!] Natalie and adorable Emaree *Natalie took this one* Natalie and Emaree again. Me and the beautiful Alyana I'll probably be taking more pictures tomorrow,So keep your eyes open!!! <33

I took a couple pictures today and as I was looking through my picture file I found a lot of picture I had forgotten to post, so here they are enjoy and comments are great :o) There's Erin in one of our last days in Computers together Me looking confused while someone was talking too me The Three Gangstaaas: Mike,Gaurauv,Gary Then Mike grabbed the camera out of my hands and took a lot of pictures There's Andrew Fields Show off those guns Andrew Mike scaring some poor girl :o( Another gangsta I'd like to call Brad Harris Gaurav flashing some freshman....poor guy :o( CLOSE UP OF NATALIE ANN! [she was having fun with my camera] One of the last days in world history with Michael [Becca took the picture while I was signing Michael's yearbook] Michael showing off his little video/digital camera....looked like a mini ridge [Becca took this one also] Awww! Mr. Romero and Ms. Gist :o( The BEST Earth Science Teachers [darn it! It came out blury] I finally went to Ulta to spend the gift card Bryan got me for my birthday and this is what I bought.... My $20 gift card :o) Thanks Bryan! I bought these REALLY NEATO nail stencils [even though as soon as I opened the package the first two rows peeled off] VERY fun designs.... Fun letters :o) I've been looking for a HAWT pink naily polish FOREVER and I have finally found one! It's so barbie and I love it! last but not least...I have finally bought myself a new compact after months of not having one :o) My Mom and I were driving down Scottsdale Road and we were stopped at a red light and I saw this really funky thing that caught my eye.... It was sooo frickin tall! My mom said some artisit made it and it was a huge sucess? I guess it's just there for decor...fun times. Going out too see "Raising Helen" with the girlys....3 nights in a row of hanging with them and loving every minute of it! If we're all lucky they will not be dykes and I'll be able to take pictures of them :o) and of course we're gonna havta make a pit stop at Jessica's lemonade stand and say a quick "hello" Makeup touch up then I'm off! The rest of you have a FAB-YOU-LOUS night and be safe!!! *Friends are the Bacon Bits in the salad bowl of life.*

Don't be scared! it's only my brother, J.P.! Waiting for the cue to start DUH-AAAAM! Who dat sexy beast? It must be Grantster!!! *melts* GOOD LORD! He's hawt Niki and Grantster helping me in my costume Trust me....I couldn't stop smiling when Grant was putting on my hood :o) Almost a Gangasta Jawa.... BOOOOO! How do I look? Me waiting for Niki to say "ACTION!" Acting out my scene.... The Jawa and Sand Monster.... Me and J.P. acting out our parts.... Me and R2D2(I think that's his name?) GROUP SHOT!!! Me talking to R2D2 ANOTHER GROUP SHOT!!! YET ANOTHER GRUP SHOT!!! R2D2 has a blue light....see it? I know ya'll are sad to see these FAB-YOU-LOUS pictures end but here's the last one..... ONE LAST GROUP PICTURE.....but this time Shawn(the card dealer)is in it You bess drop me a comment and tell me what you think of it so far! Be honest or I'll just havta hunt you down [mwahahhah] <33

Day One Our Hotel. It was soo pretty... Looks looks like Paradise Beautiful Skies filled the air at night.... Pretty ocean view The dead fish that we found on the beach Day Two Natalie(in the dress)and I(in the pink) by the pool Natalie and I goofing around in the elevator more goofing around(i like how you can't see my mouth) Diane's balcony Blury picture of my mommy and daddy Miss Natalie Ann and Me Mommy/Daddy/Natalie/Me Gorgeous view from Diane's balcony Day Three Natalie and I woke up at 830ish and headed down to the beach.... (Sara+Natalie=B.F.F) Not as easy as it looks... Suppossed to say "Happy Birthday Pete!"but I had a hard time writing it... We tried on making sand angels, but it didn't work out too well. I was too weak to make one and you could barely see them, so Natalie and I decided not to take pictures. Got back to the room, drank coffee, talked, then got ready. The last picture we took before checkout :o( longer update later....pinky promise<33
